meanings.definition: Puttiers (noun): People who engage in the activity of putting in golf.
meanings.sent1: The puttiers practiced their putting skills at the golf course.
meanings.sent2: Many puttiers enjoy spending time on the putting green.
meanings.sent3: The puttiers had a friendly competition to see who could putt the ball into the hole first.
meanings.sent4: The puttiers were like artists, carefully aiming their shots with precision.
meanings.sent5: The puttiers' dedication to perfecting their putting technique paid off during the tournament.

meanings.definition: Puttiers (verb): Third person present form of the verb 'puttier', meaning to engage in the activity of putting in golf.
meanings.sent1: He puttiers every weekend to improve his golf game.
meanings.sent2: She puttiers with enthusiasm and determination on the course.
meanings.sent3: The golfer puttiers in the rain, showing true dedication to the sport.
meanings.sent4: Putting with focus and skill, he puttiers like a professional golfer.
meanings.sent5: The way he puttiers reflects his passion for the game of golf.
